name: Snowball Madness
description:
This is "Snowball Madness", my entry for the jam made in 6 hours with Unity.

CONTROLS

A/D/Arrow Keys: Move 

Space: Jump

Left Mouse (Hold/Click): Shoot a snowball towards the cursor

If you touch the ground, you kinda die, so throw some snowballs, try not to drown and survive for as long as possible!   

How much food can you take?
